com.netflix.genie.web.scripts

Class GroovyScriptUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.netflix.genie.web.scripts.GroovyScriptUtils

  • public final class GroovyScriptUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility functions that can be used within Groovy scripts executed from Genie.
    Since:
    4.0.0

      • getCommandSelectionContext

        public static CommandSelectionContext getCommandSelectionContext(groovy.lang.Binding binding)
                                                          throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Given the Binding that a script has attempt to extract the command selection context.
        Parameters:
        binding - The Binding for the script
        Returns:
        The CommandSelectionContext instance
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If there is no context parameter for the script or it is not a CommandSelectionContext

      • getClusters

        @Deprecated
public static java.util.Set<Cluster> getClusters(groovy.lang.Binding binding)
                                                      throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Deprecated. Use getClusterSelectionContext(Binding) or getCommandSelectionContext(Binding) instead
        Given the Binding that a script has attempt to extract the clusters parameter.
        Parameters:
        binding - The Binding of the script
        Returns:
        The set of Cluster's
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If there is no clusters parameter, it isn't a set, is empty or doesn't contain all Cluster instances
